tiles.name: Gnarled Joshua Tree Grove
tiles.description: A dense cluster of gnarled Joshua trees dominates this tile, providing limited shade. Features: Ancient nesting sites, avian territories.

tiles.name: Dusty Clearing
tiles.description: A small, dusty clearing with scattered scrub. Areas of resource scarcity are evident. Migration routes may cross this tile.

tiles.name: Sagebrush Slope
tiles.description: A gentle slope covered in sagebrush. The air is dry and the sun beats down. Water presence: Sparse.

tiles.name: Cacti Cluster
tiles.description: A dense cluster of cacti of various shapes and sizes.  Features: Hidden Springs (potentially).

tiles.name: Arid Earth
tiles.description: Bare earth with a few tenacious scrub plants clinging to life. The ground is cracked and dry. Tone: Desolate.

tiles.name: Scrubland Vista
tiles.description: A vista of scrubland stretching towards the horizon.  Implied avian clan territories.

tiles.name: Sagebrush and Rock Outcrop
tiles.description: A mix of sagebrush and rocky outcrops. Terrain: Arid. Tone: Fading, but with a glimmer of hope.

tiles.name: Small Clearing with Faded Tracks
tiles.description: A small clearing, possibly used by avian clans or other creatures. Areas of resource scarcity are apparent. Era: Pre-industrial/Tribal.

tiles.name: Cacti and Dusty Wash
tiles.description: A cluster of cacti beside a dried-up wash. Water presence: Sparse. Magic: Low magic, considering adaptations.
